other_title: Cardcaptor Sakura: Die Reise nach Hongkong (German)
Sakura Cazadora de Cartas: La Película (Spanish)
Sakura, chasseuse de cartes - Le voyage à Hong-Kong (French)
劇場版　カードキャプターさくら (Japanese)
庫洛魔法使 香港之旅 (Chinese (Taiwan))
plot: Sakura wins a trip to Hong Kong. Even though she is extremely lucky, Kero questions whether Sakura was merely called to Hong Kong for a specific reason. As Sakura visits the local sites in Hong Kong, strange occurances happen to her. When two strange birds lead Sakura to a phantom world, she learns that she really was called to come to Hong Kong by a woman who wants revenge on Clow Reed.
ending_theme: "遠いこの街で (Tooi kono Machi de; In This Distant City)" by Naomi Kaitani
insert_song: "Chun Xiao Qing Ge" (春宵情歌; Spring Night Love Song) by Wuyontana
